data.text: @thehill Florida, the best example of what not to do. Putzes.
@thehill and here come all the approving crackpots...

@BuddyEdgewood @thehill @GovRonDeSantis 3) I used to think it was a conspiratorial right wing talking point but it’s not: anyone who dies w/ covid counts as a covid death, whether it’s a contributing factor or not. Bottom line, it’s virtually impossible for a healthy 7 year-old to just die from covid at this point. 2/2

@BuddyEdgewood @thehill @GovRonDeSantis Lot to unpack here. 1) Their parents should’ve gotten vaxxed if they had the chance. I am not anti-vax. I am boostered myself. 2) I would venture to guess that the vast, vast majority of those deaths were during the earlier iterations of the virus, well before the vaccine. 1/2
@thehill The CDC?  Lol. Where’s Fauci hiding?  Like magic he just disappeared.

@WilDaBeast_22 @thehill @GovRonDeSantis According to UNICEF (Dec '21) at least 1000 under 17 yo have died in the USA from COVID. Likely more now with Omicron, but those stats aren't available yet. Not significant numbers, but it's probably significant the the parents.

At least 200,000 kids have lost a parent to COVID.
